  * # Investor FAQ




#  Investor FAQ 

[Show All](#)

What is Huize 's business?

We are a leading independent online insurance product and service platform in China. Targeting the younger generation, we are dedicated to serving our insurance clients for their life-long insurance needs. Leveraging our online platform, we offer a wide variety of insurance products with a focus on long-term life and health insurance products, which are particularly suitable for our clients.

Where is Huize's corporate headquarters?

49/F, Building T1, Qianhai Financial Centre, Linhai Avenue, Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Cooperation Zone, Shenzhen, People’s Republic of China

Our main website is [www.huize.com.](http://www.huize.com.)

When did Huize start online insurance business?

Our founding team began operating an online insurance intermediary business since 2006.

On which exchange is Huize’s stock traded and what is the ticker symbol?

We are traded on the Nasdaq under the ticker symbol “HUIZ”.

Who is Huize's Depositary Bank for ADSs?

Citibank, N.A.

Who is Huize's independent auditor?

PricewaterhouseCoopers Zhong Tian LLP.

When does Huize's fiscal year end?

December 31.

How can I obtain copies of financial information from Huize?

We file Annual Reports, and furnish Current Reports with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). These reports are available on the SEC’s website at <https://www.sec.gov/>, as well as on the SEC Filings page via this website.

How do I contact Investor Relations with a question or request more information?

#### Investor Relations Contact

Email: investor@huize.com

#### Media Relations Contact

Email: mediacenter@huize.com
